si.title: මහින්දගේ පොලිස් ආරක්ෂාව පිළිබඳ බාධාවක් නොමැත
body_lines: හිටපු ජනාධිපති මහින්ද රාජපක්ෂගේ ආරක්ෂාව ද පොලිසියේ ආරක්ෂාවට සම්බන්ධ බව පොලිසිය පවසයි.

en.title: There is no disruption in Mahinda's police protection
body_lines: Police said that the security of the former President Mahinda Rajapakse was also involved in the security of the police.

summary_lines: No disruption in Mahinda Rajapaksa's police protection. Security detail includes police officers responsible for his safety.
